== How to use the http representation addon ==

 * Add http content negotiation setup
{{{
roo> http resource representation setup
}}}

 * Add one ore more JAXB2 annotated classes to the marshaller configuration.
{{{
roo> http resource add oxm --class my.package.MyJaxbClass
}}}
In result the The my.package.MyJaxbClass is added inside the *oxm:jaxb2-marshaller* element of your applicationContext-contentresolver.xml file.
